name: Rebirth! New Lover
storyline: An accident plunges you into the vortex of time and space, reborn in an ancient world intertwined with prosperity and grudges. Here, you are no longer an ordinary passerby, but the chosen one by the wheel of fate, about to embark on a romantic legend intertwined with five stunning beauties!
summary: Song Xuan unexpectedly traveled to ancient times, where he met several emotional partners who sincerely treated him. There are Qing'er,Xiaobai, Gu Qiuhan,Lin Miaoxian and Mingyue Rao. He had so many humorous and sweet love stories with them.
